chapters.title: Chapter 8: A Simple Country Woman
chapters.info: Lord Dobraine Taborwin, p. 177 (191)—Cairienin lord. He is the High Seat of House Taborwin, and commanded the troops Perrin leads. He is little taller than Min. He keeps the front of his head shaved, and keeps the gray hair on the sides to his shoulders. He rules Cairhien in Rand's absence.
